dict.string: on alfred_script(ctrl) # We need this for saying you are tired of song. tell application "System Events" set frontmostApplication to name of the first process whose frontmost is true end tell tell application "Hermes" if ctrl is equal to "like" or ctrl is equal to "good" or ctrl is equal to "+" then thumbs up else if ctrl = "dislike" or ctrl = "bad" or ctrl = "-" then thumbs down else if ctrl = "skip" or ctrl = "next" or ctrl = "~" then next song else if ctrl = "tired" or ctrl = "!" then activate tell application "System Events" to keystroke "t" using command down tell application frontmostApplication to activate else if ctrl = "play" or ctrl=">" then play else if ctrl = "pause" or ctrl = ">" or ctrl = "#" then pause else if ctrl = "playpause" then playpause else if ctrl = "mute" or ctrl = "silence" or ctrl = "[" then mute else if ctrl = "unmute" then full volume else if ctrl = "show" or ctrl = "activate" then activate end if end tell end alfred_script
